about_the_game:
Once you start playing Star Wars™ Pinball: Solo, you're in this life for good. This pack includes three exciting tables inspired by the blockbuster film. You might wanna buckle up, baby.

Solo: Experience Han's first meetings with Chewbacca, Beckett, and Lando Calrissian, and take part in epic film moments with the breakneck pace only Star Wars™ Pinball can deliver. For the first time ever in a video game, YOU can pilot the Millennium Falcon to make the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs!

Calrissian Chronicles: Lando invites you to experience his adventures, from sabacc-playing swindler to sarlacc-escaping Rebel hero. Play through iconic Lando scenes, and join his escapades as seen on TV and comics.

Battle of Mimban: War! Fight for the glory of the Empire during Han's final moments in Imperial service. Order attacks, defend your territory, train troops…and feed the Wookiee in the pit with Imperial deserters.

Solo: Experience Han's first meetings with Chewbacca, Beckett, and Lando Calrissian, and take part in epic film moments with the breakneck pace only Star Wars™ Pinball can deliver. For the first time ever in a video game, YOU can pilot the Millennium Falcon to make the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs!

Calrissian Chronicles: Lando invites you to experience his adventures, from sabacc-playing swindler to sarlacc-escaping Rebel hero. Play through iconic Lando scenes, and join his escapades as seen on TV and comics.

Battle of Mimban: War! Fight for the glory of the Empire during Han's final moments in Imperial service. Order attacks, defend your territory, train troops…and feed the Wookiee in the pit with Imperial deserters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 1.6GHz
  • Graphics: Nvida GTS 450 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Onboard audio or DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290X

short_description: Make the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs with three exciting Star Wars™ Pinball tables: Relive your favorite film moments in Solo, deploy Imperial might to win the Battle of Mimban, and live a lovable scoundrel's life in Calrissian Chronicles.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
